app_descript:
Zoho Cliq

Brief: Zoho Cliq streamlines communication within your team and with external partners like clients and vendors through a versatile platform that offers chat, audio, and video options. Beyond simple messaging, Zoho Cliq integrates with various third-party applications, maximizing productivity and organization in your business communication.
